Description:
Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the code block linked in the references

Author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation - System
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where (eventid = '7045' and (imagepath re '\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[' and imagepath re '\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[' and imagepath re '\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[' and imagepath re '\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}' and imagepath re '\\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name' and imagepath re '\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(' and imagepath re '\String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference'))
